content: {"version":2,"machineId":"7f32c7e3-c7c5-4c97-86a3-326521a4dccd","content":"{\"settings\":\"{\\n  \\\"window.restoreWindows\\\": \\\"all\\\",\\n  \\\"window.newWindowDimensions\\\": \\\"inherit\\\",\\n  // \\\"editor.suggestSelection\\\": \\\"first\\\",\\n  \\\"editor.minimap.enabled\\\": false,\\n  \\\"editor.tabSize\\\": 2,\\n  \\\"editor.rulers\\\": [120],\\n  \\\"editor.formatOnSave\\\": true,\\n  \\\"editor.codeActionsOnSave\\\": {\\n    // \\\"source.fixAll.tslint\\\": true\\n  },\\n  // \\\"editor.renderWhitespace\\\": \\\"all\\\",\\n  // \\\"workbench.activityBar.visible\\\": false,\\n  \\\"[javascript]\\\": {\\n    \\\"editor.defaultFormatter\\\": \\\"vscode.typescript-language-features\\\"\\n  },\\n  \\\"files.exclude\\\": {\\n    \\\"**/dist\\\": true,\\n    \\\"**/coverage\\\": true,\\n    \\\".history/**\\\": true\\n  },\\n  \\\"files.autoSave\\\": \\\"onFocusChange\\\",\\n  \\\"files.insertFinalNewline\\\": true,\\n  \\\"files.trimTrailingWhitespace\\\": true,\\n  \\\"javascript.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabled\\\": \\\"always\\\",\\n  \\\"javascript.implicitProjectConfig.experimentalDecorators\\\": true,\\n  \\\"terminal.integrated.shell.windows\\\": \\\"C:\\\\\\\\Program Files\\\\\\\\Git\\\\\\\\bin\\\\\\\\bash.exe\\\",\\n  \\\"typescript.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabled\\\": \\\"always\\\",\\n  \\\"[typescript]\\\": {\\n    \\\"editor.defaultFormatter\\\": \\\"vscode.typescript-language-features\\\",\\n    \\\"editor.formatOnSave\\\": true,\\n    \\\"editor.formatOnPaste\\\": true\\n  },\\n  \\\"[html]\\\": {\\n    \\\"editor.formatOnPaste\\\": true,\\n    \\\"editor.defaultFormatter\\\": \\\"vscode.html-language-features\\\"\\n  },\\n  \\\"html.format.wrapLineLength\\\": 23,\\n  // \\\"eslint.validate\\\": [\\n  //     \\\"html\\\",\\n  //     \\\"javascript\\\",\\n  // ],\\n  // A day number to purge local history. (0: no purge)\\n  \\\"local-history.daysLimit\\\": 30,\\n  \\\"local-history.maxDisplay\\\": 10,\\n  \\\"local-history.enabled\\\": 2,\\n  \\\"macros\\\": {\\n    \\\"getOutTheMethod\\\": [\\n      \\\"editor.action.jumpToBracket\\\",\\n      \\\"cursorRight\\\",\\n      \\\"editor.action.insertLineAfter\\\",\\n      \\\"editor.action.insertLineAfter\\\"\\n    ],\\n    \\\"commentLine\\\": [\\\"editor.action.commentLine\\\", \\\"cursorDown\\\"]\\n  },\\n  // \\\"html.format.enable\\\": false,\\n  \\\"[json]\\\": {\\n    \\\"editor.defaultFormatter\\\": \\\"esbenp.prettier-vscode\\\",\\n    \\\"editor.formatOnPaste\\\": true\\n  },\\n  \\\"search.exclude\\\": {\\n    \\\"**/node_modules\\\": false,\\n    \\\"**/bower_components\\\": true,\\n    \\\"**/.history\\\": true\\n  },\\n  //todo extension settings\\n  \\\"todohighlight.isEnable\\\": true,\\n  // scss extension settings\\n  \\\"scss.scannerExclude\\\": [\\\"**/.git\\\", \\\"**/bower_components\\\", \\\"**/.history\\\"],\\n  // typescript hero extension settings\\n  \\\"typescriptHero.imports.multiLineWrapThreshold\\\": 100,\\n  \\\"typescriptHero.imports.disableImportsSorting\\\": false,\\n  \\\"typescriptHero.imports.grouping\\\": [\\n    \\\"Plains\\\",\\n    \\\"Modules\\\",\\n    \\\"/@infoblox/core/\\\",\\n    \\\"Workspace\\\"\\n  ],\\n  \\\"typescriptHero.imports.insertSpaceBeforeAndAfterImportBraces\\\": true,\\n  \\\"typescriptHero.imports.insertSemicolons\\\": true,\\n  \\\"typescriptHero.imports.multiLineTrailingComma\\\": false,\\n  \\\"diffEditor.ignoreTrimWhitespace\\\": true,\\n  \\\"git.allowForcePush\\\": true,\\n  \\\"editor.fontLigatures\\\": false,\\n  \\\"explorer.confirmDragAndDrop\\\": false,\\n  \\\"[scss]\\\": {\\n    \\\"editor.defaultFormatter\\\": \\\"esbenp.prettier-vscode\\\"\\n  },\\n  \\\"extensions.ignoreRecommendations\\\": true,\\n  \\\"breadcrumbs.enabled\\\": true,\\n  \\\"git.openDiffOnClick\\\": false\\n  // \\\"editor.fontLigatures\\\": null,\\n}\"}"}
